column1: Advanced Engineering Management (with Specialist Pathways) - MSc
column5: The Advanced Engineering Management Programme (AEMP) is delivered jointly by the School of Engineering and the Birmingham Business School, combining the expertise and strengths of both schools to offer a high quality, distinctive and flexible course.Â The programme introduces core management concepts in semester one before you select one of four specialist pathways in semester two. You also have the opportunity to choose a mixed pathway route, tailoring the course to your
